A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is a good movie\, better than TFA\, but still it is just that\, it has too many mistakes\, they wasted Luke\, it is the worst case scenario for an old Luke Skywalker. It copies most of its story from ESB with some of ROTJ\, it has plain story\, with too many jokes. Sadly it destroys what could have been a master piece. Its not a movie for fans of the saga. If you are not a fan the movie is gonna be great.
